author: jochembrouwer
content: <@!211091239112671234> request for Baikal: can we get more pre-fork blocks? Then we can send some test txs pre-fork in order to ensure that EIPs are not active. Could you also pre-seed 0xbaadf00d42264eeb3fafe6799d0b56cf55df0f00? I will (if time permits) prepare the pre-fork test txs ðŸ™‚

author: jochembrouwer
content: I would also need a RPC endpoint to send the test txs, JS does not support TxPool yet

author: holiman
content: Unless there are other changes, I'd prefer not to, since it would change the genesis hash. If so, I'll fund it first thing once we boot it up. Changing the number of blocks can be done without modding the genesis hash -- how many blocks would you want?

author: jochembrouwer
content: Depends on the launch time, but I'd say 4 hours so 960 blocks? For a nice number let's round it up to 1000 ðŸ˜„

author: holiman
content: I set the block time to 30s, btw. Usually most blocks are empty, on testnest, and I figured also that it might be good to have a full 30s to submit txs, if we want to experiment with stuffing blocks as full as possible

author: holiman
content: (doesn't affect the genesis hash either, so can be changed)

author: jochembrouwer
content: Ah cool. Then 500 blocks? When do we aim to launch the testnet?

author: holiman
content: We're merging the baikal definition PRs now (refund reduction, `0xef` contract disallow). After that, we need to rebase 1559 on top, but then it would be fully possible to run baikal off of the 1559 pr, even before it's merged to master. And that rebase should be done today. So after the call tomorrow, we can spin up one signer. That one would just seal a block, then wait for another signer to seal the next one.

author: holiman
content: if we decide to change 1559 re `gasLimit`, I think we should still be able to have a sealer up this on friday or during the weekend

author: jochembrouwer
content: Cool. I will definitely be able to prepare test txs in case we launch on the weekend. But tomorrow might be possible too. I have two uni deadlines tomorrow though.
